name: Liver 9
description:
Some neighbors heard paranormal sounds coming out of the old Uwaoka school

Go and kill what ever monster lies inside...

How to play:

  • Use WASD keys to move and mouse to control camera movement
  • Find the monster using your cellphone as guidence, when prompted use left click to make the monster materialize
  • Use left click to fire your shotgun
  • Weapon switches automatically acording to the situation
